subject: Baseball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Manager Ozzie Guillen, hired to lead a reshaped team and draw fans to new Marlins Park, finished 69-93, last in the National League East.
snippet: Manager Ozzie Guillen, hired to lead a reshaped team and draw fans to new Marlins Park, finished 69-93, last in the National League East.
